title: United Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Protection of Persons in the Event of Disasters
text:
United Nations 
A/C.6/80/L.24 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
20 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-18983 (E)    201125  
*2518983* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 86 
Protection of persons in the event of disasters 
 
 
 
 
 
Russian Federation: amendment to draft resolution A/C.6/80/L.14 
 
 
 
 United Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Protection of 
Persons in the Event of Disasters 
 
 
 
In operative paragraph 2, delete “, to decide on the participation of stakeholders 
other than those referred to in paragraph 9 below, including on the modalities for such 
decision and participation, on the basis of a list of relevant non-governmental 
organizations, civil society organizations, academic institutions and the private sector 
to be prepared by the Secretariat, and”.
